head.supplied: [Mr Ferdinand Von Mueller, Director of the Botanical Garden of Melbourne (Australia) has written to the Rural Society on 1st. of January of this year, acknowledging receipt of the seeds that the Socie...

div.p:
Letter not found. The text given here is from 'Semillas de Australia' [Australian seeds], Anales de la Sociedad Rural Argentina1(871), vol. 5, p. 195.
[El Sr. D. Fernando Von Mueller, Director del Jardin Botánico de Melbourne (Australia) se ha dirijido á la Sociedad Rural con fecha 1º. de Enero del corriente año, acusando recibo de las semillas que la Sociedad le envió el año pasado para establecer un cambio mútual con aquel reputado establecimento, y anunciando el proximo envió de una coleccio de semillas de árboles de aquel pais.

p.seg: [Mr Ferdinand Von Mueller, Director of the Botanical Garden of Melbourne (Australia) has written to the Rural Society on 1st. of January of this year, acknowledging receipt of the seeds that the Society sent him last year to establish a mutual exchange with that reputable establishment,

p.style: font-family: Geneva; margin-left: 0.3346in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: -0.3346in; font-size: 9pt;

note.p: See J. Martinez de Hoz to M, August 1870 (in this edition as 70-08-00).

p.seg: and announcing the next shipment of a collection of tree seeds from that country.

p.style: font-family: Geneva; margin-left: 0.3346in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: -0.3346in; font-size: 9pt;

note.p: See M to the Sociedad Rural Argentina, 10 February 1871 (in this edition as 71-02-10a).
